intro: Find the hiding invisible spirit in the photo by using your spiritual-vision-smartphone!
description:
The smartphone you got...
It had a special ability to see the spirits......

A picture of a mundane, ordinary day...
But inside, there was an invisible spirit......!

An earthbound spirit after a regrettable death, a spirit with a grudge on the person in the picture, sometimes a guardian angel, and even things that are not a spirit......

Now let’s hold up your spiritual-vision-smartphone, and open your eyes to the existence of the hidden spirits...!
There must be a terrifying experience waiting for you......

If you get scared easily and are playing alone, beware and make sure to light up the room and take a bath before you play the game...!
